description.en: One of the legend cloaks (honor, light, sea god), It makes increase drop rate.
description.ar: One of the legend cloaks (honor, light, sea god), It makes increase drop rate.
description.br: Uma das 3 capas lendárias (Honra, Luz, Deus do Mar), aumenta a taxa de queda de itens.
description.cns: 瑞加大陆从以前流传下来的传说3大披风(荣耀,光芒,龙王)的其中之一, 使用后可以获得双倍掉宝效果。
description.de: Einer der 3 legendären Umhänge aus Madrigal: Honour, Light und Sea.
description.fi: One of the legend cloaks (honor, light, sea god), It makes increase drop rate.
description.fil: One of the legend cloaks (honor, light, sea god), It makes increase drop rate.
description.fr: Une des trois légendaires capes de Madrigal : Honneur, Lumière et Océanique. Elle vous permet d'obtenir des objets supplémentaires sur les monstres.
description.id: Salah satu jubah legenda (kehormatan, cahaya, dewa laut). Meningkatkan drop rate.
description.it: One of the legend cloaks (honor, light, sea god), It makes increase drop rate.
description.jp: マドリガル大陸にいにしえから伝わる伝説のマントの1つ。
description.kr: 마드리갈 대륙에 옛부터 전해저 내려오는 전설의 3대 망토(영광,빛,용왕) 중 하나. 착용하는 순간 이상하게 마스커펫 으로부터 아이템을 더 획득할 수 있다.
description.nl: One of the legend cloaks (honor, light, sea god), It makes increase drop rate.
description.pl: One of the legend cloaks (honor, light, sea god), It makes increase drop rate.
description.ru: Один из трех легендарных плащей, повышающих вероятность выпадения добычи. Другие два плаща зовутся Плащом света и Плащом Посейдона.
description.sp: Una de las capas legendarias (honor, luz, dios del mar), hace que aumente la tasa de caída.
description.sw: One of the legend cloaks (honor, light, sea god), It makes increase drop rate.
description.th: หนึ่งในเสื้อคลุมในตำนาน (เกียรติยศ แสง เทพแห่งท้องทะเล) ทำให้อัตราการดรอปเพิ่มขึ้น
description.tw: 瑪德利賈大陸從以前流傳下來的傳說3大斗篷中(榮耀,光芒,龍王)的其中之一，使用後可以從怪物身上獲得更多道具
description.vi: Một trong những chiếc áo choàng huyền thoại (danh dự, ánh sáng, thần biển), Nó làm tăng tỷ lệ rơi.
